definitions.text: a method of tending to or managing the affairs of a some group of people (especially the group's business affairs)
the persons (or committees or departments etc.) who make up a body for the purpose of administering something
examples: he claims that the present administration is corrupt
the governance of an association is responsible to its members
he quickly became recognized as a member of the establishment
things were quiet during the Eisenhower administration

definitions.text: the act of governing; exercising authority
examples: regulations for the governing of state prisons
he had considerable experience of government

definitions.text: the act of meting out justice according to the law
